mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TRANSACTION_HISTORY ( tx_id, block_hash, coin_type, address, balance, confirmations, update_time ) VALUES ( #{txId}, #{blockHash}, #{coinType}, #{address}, #{balance}, #{confirmations}, now() )
mapper.select: SELECT tx_id, block_hash, coin_type, address, balance, confirmations, DATE_FORMAT(update_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd"t"hh24:mi:ss"z"') AS updateDttm FROM TRANSACTION_HISTORY WHERE tx_Id = #{txId}

SELECT tx_id, block_hash, coin_type, address, balance, confirmations, DATE_FORMAT(update_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd"t"hh24:mi:ss"z"') AS updateDttm FROM TRANSACTION_HISTORY
WHERE confirmations < #{confirmations}
SELECT tx_id, block_hash, coin_type, address, balance, confirmations, DATE_FORMAT(update_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd"t"hh24:mi:ss"z"') AS updateDttm FROM TRANSACTION_HISTORY WHERE block_hash = #{blockHash}
